li: In certain cases, if any, Parties choose not to apply the fictive employment relationship of home workers or their equivalent as referred to in Sections 2b and 2c of the ‘Uitvoeringsbesluit Loonbelasting 1965’ [Wages and Salaries Tax (Implementation) Decree 1965] and Sections 1 and 5 of the ‘Besluit aanwijzing gevallen waarin arbeidsverhouding als dienstbetrekking wordt beschouwd’ (Decree of 24 December 1986, State Gazette 1986, 655), [Identification of Working Relationships as Employment Decree] and therefore Parties will draw up and sign this agreement before payment is made;
